attributes.action: resign and call a general election immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should call for a vote of no confidence in the present government. After a series of blunders and cover-ups which have immense consequences for the general public the government carries on with its cavalier disregard for our wishes. They are not competent to manage this country on too many issues to justify their continuation in office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
